short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With PTCL Speed Test Chrome Extension, you can check out your upload and download speed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can check your internet speed from your desktop using PTCL Speed Test. With this test tool, you can see both upload and download times. In this way, you can figure out which version of the internet is right for you. Try this PTCL Net Speed Test extension.
